mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tenant_capacity ( id, tenant_id, quota, usage, max_size, max_aggr_count, max_aggr_size, max_history_count, gmt_create, gmt_modified ) VALUES
( #{record.id}, #{record.tenantId}, #{record.quota}, #{record.usage}, #{record.maxSize}, #{record.maxAggrCount}, #{record.maxAggrSize}, #{record.maxHistoryCount}, #{record.gmtCreate}, #{record.gmtModified} )
